name: vitejs-stack-mern-quickstart
description: This is a quick start project template that combines the power of Vite.js and the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) stack. It provides a solid foundation for building modern web applications with a fast development experience.
author: Tox

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "red,blue" -p "[{name}]" "cd server && tsc && node dist/server.js" "cd client && yarn run dev" "cd client && yarn run sass"
scripts.dev-client: concurrently "cd client && yarn run dev" "cd client && yarn run sass"
